name: micro-service
description: Microservice architecture with Book Service, Reservation Service and Frontend

scripts.install:all: cd apps/book-service && npm install && cd ../reservation-service && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd apps/book-service && npm run build && cd ../reservation-service && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd apps/book-service && npm test && cd ../reservation-service && npm test
